---
title: Lexicon of Old Shókë
---

## Pointing words

* _kæt_: this
* _shox_: that
* _dhon_: the other

## Negation and interrogation

* _che_: no/not
* _dæ_: question particle

## Exclamation

* _xoj_!: wow!

## Pronouns

* _ke_:    I/me
* _keke_:  we/us (exclusive of the addressee(s))

* _shoke_: we/us (inclusive of the addressee(s))

* _sho_:   you    (singular)
* _shosho_: you    (plural)

* _dho_:     he/she/him/her
* _dhodho_:   they/them

## Nouns

* _chak_:   ash
* _jitjit_: bird
* _...._:   blood
* _tok_:    bone
* _...._:   child
* _...._:   cloud
* _shama_:  day
* _...._:   eye
* _kesh_:   fire
* _...._:   hand
* _næth_:   leaf
* _xom_:    moon
* _zhizh_:  mosquito/fly
* _xoma_:   night
* _...._:   parent
* _shuk_:   person
* _tæsh_:   rain
* _trm_:    river
* _...._:   soil
* _meka_:   squirrel
* _koch_:   stone
* _sha_:    sun
* _dej_:    tooth
* _dhæm_:   tree
* _mrm_:    water
* _shish_:  wind

## Verbs

* _mish_:     breathe
* _katrk_:    come
* _mrm-kætr_: drink   -- water  take?
* _...._:     eat     -- food   take?
* _shoxtr_:   give
* _trk_:      go
* _...._:     hear
* _...._:     run
* _...._:     see     -- eye    something?
* _shem_:     sleep
* _shæx_:     speak
* _kætr_:     take
* _...._:     walk    -- person go?

## Adjectives

* _mom_:  round
* _tet_:  flat
* _tik_:  sharp
